HomePage.pls_select_a_file_to_edit: Please select a file to edit

file_header.SrcFileName_tip: Source file path; mostly unused, but should not be empty. The game typically only uses this value in error logs (2.41.1), but if your game is not in Japanese, it will attempt to use this value for translation matching
file_header.ItemName_tip: Item name; unused, but should not be empty. The game only reads and discards this value (2.41.1); the actual value is taken from the command segment.
file_header.Category_tip: Item category; unused, but should not be empty. The game only reads and discards this value (2.41.1); the actual value is taken from the command segment.
file_header.SetInfoText_tip: Item description; mostly unused, but should not be empty. The game typically only reads and discards this value (2.41.1); however, under certain circumstances, if this value is 'acctatoo' or 'hokuro', the game will remove the accessories in these two slots.

file_header.Name: Note Name
file_header.Name_tip: Name: A name for your reference; the game only reads and discards this value (2.41.1)
file_header.Material_Name_tip: Material Name: The name of the material; the game assigns it to material.name, and also attempts to find and use a .pmat file with the same name.
file_header.Material_ShaderName_tip: Shader Name: The name of the shader; the game attempts to find and use a shader with the same name.
file_header.Material_ShaderFilename_tip: Shader File Name: The filename of the shader; the game will attempt to locate this shader file in a specific path.

MateEditor.property_name_tip: Property name; the game will assign this value as the corresponding name. For textures, it sets the texture name; for colors, it sets the color of the corresponding texture; similarly for vectors and floats.
MateEditor.col_tip: Color (col): A color value; the game assigns this value to the corresponding texture's color.
MateEditor.vec_tip: Vector (vec): A vector value, which is essentially a color but with RGBA replaced by XYZW; the game assigns this value to the corresponding texture's color.
MateEditor.tex2dName_tip: 2D Texture Name; the game will attempt to find and load a .tex file with the same name.
MateEditor.tex2dPath_tip: 2D Texture Path; unused, but should not be empty. The game only reads and discards this value (2.41.1).
MateEditor.unknown_text_1_tip: Unknown Text 1; unused, the game only reads and discards this value (2.41.1), presumed to be Render Texture.
MateEditor.unknown_text_2_tip: Unknown Text 2; unused, the game only reads and discards this value (2.41.1), presumed to be Render Texture.

PMatEditor.materialName_tip: Material name; must be exactly the same as the material name in the .mate file. The game needs to calculate the hash for caching (2.41.1)
PMatEditor.renderQueue_tip: Render Queue (RQ); the game will set this value according to the corresponding render order (2.41.1). The higher the value, the later it is rendered. Generally, the GPU renders in layers, with later renders overlaying earlier ones. Default range: 0 - 5000.
PMatEditor.shaderName_tip: Shader name; has no effect, the game does not even read this field (2.41.1)

Errors.pls_input_menu_file_path_to_open: Please enter the path of the .menu file to open
Errors.pls_input_file_path_first: Please enter the file path first
Errors.json_root_node_not_array: JSON root node is not an array
Errors.invalid_path_or_mate_data: Invalid file path or Mate data
